techmeme.title: Microsoft researchers unveil SpreadsheetLLM, an encoding method designed to enable LLMs to efficiently understand and analyze complex spreadsheet data (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Sources: Index is Wiz's largest outside shareholder, with an 11%+ stake; Sequoia owns 10%+, Insight owns ~9%, Greenoaks owns ~5%, and Cyberstarts owns ~4% (The Information)
Apple launches the public betas for iOS 18, iPadOS 18, macOS Sequoia, and watchOS 11, but without any Apple Intelligence features (Wes Davis/The Verge)
Nullbulge, a hacktivist group critical of AI art, leaks Slack messages allegedly from Disney due to "how it handles artist contracts" and "its approach to AI" (Wall Street Journal)
A look at Trump VP pick JD Vance's tech ties, including working at Peter Thiel's Mithril Capital and investing in Rumble; Vance advocated repealing Section 230 (Vittoria Elliott/Wired)
